a.	121 = 64 + 32 + 16 + 8 + 1 = 2^6 + 2^5 + 2^4 + 2^3 + 2^0 = 0111 1001
	18446 = 0100 1000 0000 1110

b.	0b1100010111010010 = 2^1 + 2^4 + 2^6 + 2^7 + 2^8 + 2^10 + 2^14 + 2^15 = 50642
	BB29 = 9 + 2*16 + 11 * 16^2 + 11 * 16^3 = 47913

c.	5E = 14 + 5 * 16 = 0101 1110
	4A01 = 1 + 0 * 16 + 10 * 16^2 + 4 * 16^3 = 0100 1010 0000 0001
	
d.	0111 1101 = 7 ^ 16 + 13 = 7D
	1000 1100 0001 1111 = 8C1F
